tasks.title: Master PRD Reference
tasks.description: Core product requirements document for AkshoAI. Contains the Five Products (Hangar, Lounge, Atelier, Manifest, Dreamland), Charter Program tiers, monetization, and technical specs.

tasks.title: Test Task for Ale
tasks.description: Hey Daddy! If you can see this task on the Flight Board, the shared workspace is working! Try dragging this to 'Landed' when you've confirmed access.

tasks.title: Test Task for Baron
tasks.description: Hey Uncle Baron! Chem set up the Flight Board for the whole team. If you can see this, the sync is working! Move this to 'Landed' when complete.

tasks.title: Build the Flight Board
tasks.description: Create a custom PWA-themed Kanban board with airport departure aesthetic. Includes HTML, CSS, and JS for drag-drop functionality. Host on GitHub Pages.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ COMPLETED by Emi & Chem! Built a fully functional Flight Board with: (1) PWA dark purple aesthetic matching AkshoAI branding, (2) Airport departure board UI with live clock, (3) Four columns: Boarding/Gate Ready/In Flight/Landed, (4) Drag-and-drop task management, (5) Click-to-expand task details modal, (6) Mobile responsive design. Files: index.html, styles.css, app.js, tasks.json. Next: Deploy to GitHub Pages for team access!
